column4: Hi, completely new to ubintu and I s?hall download an iso for installation on my PC. Shall I use ubuntu-6.06-alternate-i386.iso  or ubuntu-6.06-desktop-i386.iso?
ok, in that case I go for the alternate then. I am planning to set dual boot for XP and ubuntu
This is probably the right place to ask but I wounder about the developers of ubuntu, do they work for free or do they get paid for their work?
